item.title: Cg1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: GRMZM5G838324 Gene Symbol: Cg1 Gene Name: Corngrass1 Genome: B73_RefGen_v3 Species: Zea mays Functional Descriptions: Furthermore, a target of Cg1 is teosinte glume architecture1 (tga1)1, a gene known to have had a role in the domestication of maize from teosinte.

item.title: ClAGA2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cla97C04G070460 Gene Symbol: ClAGA2 Gene Name: alkaline alpha-galactosidase Genome: Species: Citrullus lanatus Functional Descriptions: Through a genome-wide association study, the alkaline alpha-galactosidase ClAGA2 was identified as the key factor controlling stachyose and Raf hydrolysis, and it was determined to be specifically expressed in the vascular bundle.

item.title: ClVST1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cla97C02G031010 Gene Symbol: ClVST1 Gene Name: vacuolar sugar transporter Genome: watermelon genome database Species: Citrullus lanatus Functional Descriptions: Report a novel vacuolar sugar transporter (ClVST1) identified through map-based cloning and association study, whose expression in fruit phloem is associated with accumulation of sucrose (Suc) in watermelon fruit.

item.title: GmZF392
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.12G205700 Gene Symbol: GmZF392 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a4_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmZF392, a tandem CCCH zinc finger (TZF) protein which was identified in our previous RNA-seq analysis of seed-preferred transcription factors, was found to function as a positive regulator of lipid production.

item.title: PRR3b;Tof12
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.12G073900 Gene Symbol: PRR3b Tof12 Gene Name: Time of Flowering 12 Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: PRR3b photoperiodic flowering time regulation Tof11 and Tof12 encode PSEUDO-RESPONSE-REGULATOR-proteins Tof12 and Tof11, to ancient flowering time adaptation, and demonstrate that they act via LHY homologs to promote expression of the legume-specific E1 gene and delay flowering under long photoperiods.

item.title: RLL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: RLL1 Gene Name: Red Lettuce Leaves 1 Genome: Lsat_Salinas_v8 Species: Lactuca sativa Functional Descriptions: The characterization of multiple polymorphic genes in this study provides the necessary molecular resources for the rational breeding of lettuce cultivars with distinct levels of red pigments and green cultivars with high levels of health-promoting flavonoids.
